    Grid-based spatial sampling

    sample_grid.Rd

    Grid-based spatial sampling

    sample_grid(
  coordinates,
  n_target,
  grid_size,
  min_cells_per_region,
  balance_regions
)

    Arguments

    coordinates

    Spatial coordinates

    n_target

    Number of neighbours

    grid_size

    Grid size

    min_cells_per_region

    Mimimum cells per region

    balance_regions

    Balance regions
